thread.title: #BigMan: Kcee Defies Police Warning, Flaunts Stacks Of Hard Currency [LOOK]
thread.title_full: #BigMan: Kcee Defies Police Warning, Flaunts Stacks Of Hard Currency [LOOK]

author: Augustine Ogwo | Staff Writer
title: #BigMan: Kcee Defies Police Warning, Flaunts Stacks Of Hard Currency [LOOK]
text: #BigMan: Kcee Defies Police Warning, Flaunts Stacks Of Hard Currency #BigMan: Kcee Defies Police Warning, Flaunts Stacks Of Hard Currency [LOOK] Oct 1, 2015 0 It appears Nigerian singer, Kcee is not aware of the warning by the Lagos State Police command urging celebrities to desist from flaunting their wealth on social media for security reasons. If he is aware, he obviously doesn’t give a damn. The Five star music artiste has shared a photo of him carrying an unzipped bag filled with stacks of foreign currency on Instagram. He captioned the photo: “On my way @iam_emoney1 #Agbomma #MrTalkAndDo “ Sponsored Links
